content: I think I'll try manual tracking for now, using a measuring cup to track the amount of water in her bowl at the start and end of each day. It seems like a simple and cost-effective way to get a sense of her water intake. I'll log the data in the pet care app I choose, either Petnet or PetMD. Do you think I should also track her food intake and waste output to get a better understanding of her overall health?
